name: Lazy Afternoon Hidden Objects Volume 1 Demo
name_original: Lazy Afternoon Hidden Objects Volume 1 Demo
description:
This demo of Lazy Afternoon Hidden Objects Volume 1 offers the first 5 introductory scenes. For a short time, Volume 1 is being offered for $0.99 before anymore scenes are added. Once purchased, you will receive all upgrades and new scenes for FREE! No additional purchases are required to receive all 50 scenes as they are added.

The features within these scenes are great for those learning English or words in general. Features include but are not limited to:

  • Text to Speech
  • Shadow of Objects for additional help.
  • Unlimited Hints

Each scene has 50-70 hidden objects to find and has its own theme. It is ideal for those who just simply enjoy finding hidden objects within a scene. We look forward to hearing your comments, ideas, and suggestions you may have for future scenes!
